title: Animals
subtitle: Which animal feels most like you?

questions.prompt: You find a new playground. Where do you go first?

answers.label: Try every piece at once
Find a friend and go together
Check where it's safe
Start a game that leads to the highest jump

questions.prompt: An animal in your storybook gets lost.

answers.label: Go search it with courage
Draw a map and follow clues
Ask for help from others
Create a fun song about its trail

questions.prompt: You get one free morning at a wildlife center.

answers.label: Meet as many creatures as possible
Volunteer with patient care
Stick with your favorite animal
Study each habitat and take notes

questions.prompt: You see someone being unkind to a classmate.

answers.label: Stand up gently and defend them
Offer comfort to your classmate
Call an adult and mediate
Ignore and choose another group

questions.prompt: Your team is doing a group science task.

answers.label: Lead with confident direction
Look up how others did it before
Make sure everyone has a role
Turn it into a game for laughs

questions.prompt: You hear a strange noise at night.

answers.label: Investigate with a flashlight
Check windows and make a safe plan
Tell your family and stay together
Create a dramatic story about it

questions.prompt: You find an old toy boat by the river.

answers.label: Try to build a better one
Test it in the water
Find its owner and return it
Paint it and celebrate with friends

questions.prompt: You are asked to perform at a school event.

answers.label: Perform with energy and confidence
Rehearse quietly until perfect
Ask friends to perform with you
Create a unique idea that stands out

characters.name: Lion
characters.bio: You take charge with confidence and protect your group.

characters.name: Dolphin
characters.bio: You are playful, clever, and full of joy while helping friends.

characters.name: Owl
characters.bio: You pause, notice details, then act with calm precision.

characters.name: Fox
characters.bio: You solve problems with creativity and keep things exciting.

characters.name: Dog
characters.bio: You stay close to the people you care about and keep things fun.

characters.name: Cat
characters.bio: You enjoy your space, but deeply care about comfort and rhythm.

characters.name: Elephant
characters.bio: You combine calm strength with a compassionate heart.

characters.name: Panda
characters.bio: You like steady peace, kindness, and simple joy.

characters.name: Eagle
characters.bio: You see the big picture and push toward big goals.

characters.name: Otter
characters.bio: You keep things fun while helping your friends with clever ideas.
